message: Bob, this is a fair offer considering the potential loss due to inflation in each round. If we wait, the total amount will shrink quickly by 20%, reducing your share significantly. Let's lock in this deal now to avoid losing more value in future rounds.
Sam, I think a 50/50 split is fair. This way, we can both get the most out of the money, and we don't have to worry about losing value with each round. Let's end this now and get our share!
